name: mern-js-documentation
description: MERN Stack Documentation Project with FAANG Standards

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.test: concurrently "cd frontend && npm test" "cd backend && npm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint" "cd backend && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint:fix" "cd backend && npm run lint:fix"
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
